mapper.sql: id , date, appId, adUnitId, adUnitName, clickCount, clickRate, ecpm, exposureCount, exposureRate, income, reqSuccCount
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(t.appId) AS productCount, SUM(t.visitPv) AS wxVisit, SUM(t.visitUv) AS wxActive, SUM(t.visitUvNew) AS wxNew, SUM(t.stayTimeUv) AS wxAvgOnline , DATE(t.refDate) AS wxDate, SUM(s.shareUv) AS wxShareUser,SUM(s.sharePv) AS wxShareCount FROM persie_value.wx_daily_visit_trend AS t LEFT JOIN persie_value.wx_daily_summary AS s ON t.appId = s.appId AND t.refDate =s.refDate WHERE DATE(t.refDate) between #{start} and #{end} GROUP BY t.refDate
